title: "Get started"
---

A package should use git and be hosted on a remote repository. Below we describe how to use GitHub.

## Setting up a repository with GitHub pages using `usethis`

1. `use_git()`
1. `use_github()`
1. `use_description()`
1. `use_github_action(...)`
1. `use_github_pages()`

See more in page about GH actions.
